verbs.description: [ARG1: harassment bias claims against l a councilman jose huizar] [V: filed] [ARGM-MNR: via city new site for workplace misconduct] [ARGM-ADV: reporting] los angeles city council president herb wesson has instructed the city personnel department to convene a special panel to look into a complaint of harassment discrimination and retaliation against councilman jose huizar officials said this week josé huizar al seib special committee bruce whidden eric garcetti herb wesson misconduct harassment los angeles city council
